title: Disconnects.
body: Hey. I have been playing on my mobile internet when necessary for about 4-5 months now and everything ha been working fine. But in the past few weeks, with the same carrier, when i start loading to play a game it works great, but when I am ingame, i disconnect every 2-3 minutes and reconnect again after a minute or so. Also, I am now having problems loading. A pop-up shows which says could not connect to the server and mentions firewalls, even though all my firewalls are turned off. This is aggravating as I'm scared of getting banned. Please help! thanks -y {{item:3151}}

replies.body: No, it takes a normal amount of time!. The thing is, I have no home internet, my dad recently shut it off. I can buy a modem, but I can't access the internet, because if I want to, I need to get a plan for it, & those require me to be 18. :L

Just buy a cheap modem, I am really surprised you can run this game on mobile internet. I feel like I was cheated by the internet company to access internet using a stupid expensive modem.

Modems are dirt cheap nowadays any ways, just buy one.

The thing about phones is that they weren't designed to last like a modem. If you're continually and repeatedly using it to connect to the internet via tether or hotspot (hotspot being even worse) then it's a possibility that you've damaged your phone.

When you're browsing the internet on your phone, do pages sometimes take a lot longer than the should to load?
